entry.title: https://github.com/KhronosGroup/SPIRV-LLVM-Translator
entry.content: A tool and a library for bi-directional translation between SPIR-V and LLVM IR

entry.title: https://github.com/arm/arm-toolchain
entry.content: A project dedicated to building LLVM toolchain for Arm and AArch64 embedded targets and AArch64 native Linux development.

entry.title: https://github.com/intel/llvm
entry.content: Intel staging area for llvm.org contribution. Home for Intel LLVM-based projects.

entry.title: https://github.com/llvm/llvm-project
entry.content: The LLVM Project is a collection of modular and reusable compiler and toolchain technologies.
